items.title: U.K. designates Apple and Google as having ‘strategic market status,’ opening door for more regulation
items.summary: The U.K.’s competition regulator has designated Apple and Google with “strategic market status” in their mobile platforms, giving the regulator new powers to enforce competition in areas like app stores, browsers, and operating systems.

items.title: GM’s under-the-hood overhaul puts AI and automated driving at the center

items.title: GM is bringing Google Gemini-powered AI assistant to cars in 2026
items.summary: GM is the latest automaker to lean into generative AI-based assistants that promise to respond to driver requests in a more natural-sounding way. Stellantis is collaborating with French AI firm Mistral, Mercedes is integrating ChatGPT, and Tesla has brought xAI’s Grok to its vehicles.

items.title: GM to introduce eyes-off, hands-off driving system in 2028

items.summary:
Today only, as part of its Deal Zone offers, B&H currently has Samsung’s 2TB T7 Shield portable SSD in blue down at $129.99 shipped with a $70 coupon that auto-applies during checkout. Originally $240, this particular drive has lately been fetching close to $200 at Amazon and Samsung, with some occasional deals dropping it down to the $150 mark. Today’s deal at B&H, however, beats that with a $70 discount on its usual going rate, making this a great time to cash in. items.title: Luigi’s Mansion hits Switch 2 GameCube library soon, grab Luigi’s Mansion 3 at $43 today
items.summary:
Nintendo has now officially announced that Luigi’s Mansion is set to land on the Nintendo Classics GameCube library for Switch 2 just ahead of Halloween this month, just as we hoped for. That means the entire Luigi’s haunted mansion series will soon be playable on Switch 2 and if you haven’t landed a copy of the latest title, you can grab one on sale for $42.99 Prime shipped (a $6 delivery fee will apply otherwise) over at Woot. Deals on the regularly $60 Luigi’s Mansion 3 don’t come around all too often outside of these Woot sales as of late and now’s your chance to land physical copy to enjoy ahead of Halloween and the release of the original title on Switch Online. 

Nintendo officially announces the next Switch 2 GameCube release

With the new M5 iPad Pro models now up for pre-order we are starting some particularly notable discounts on elect M4 variants. Yesterday’s giant $444 price drop on the high-end 11-inch model is still live, but today we are turning our attention towards hundreds in savings on one of the most affordable models in the lineup.

items.summary:

items.summary:
